page.title: 20CREDITS TO AUTHORS,S.LEEDS
page.content: The schools taking part in this part of the Domesday Project and the teachers involved were: {Mr. C.J.Breese(Hugh Gaitskell {Middle School) {Mrs.M.Derrick and Mr. P.Haswell {(Hunslet C of E Middle School) {Mrs.L.Wilson (Bewerley Street Primary) {Mr. Shilton (Belle isle Middle School) {Mr. T.Bigland(Cross Flatts Middle) The people involved with the writing of work were: {Robert O'Brien,Louise Noon,Gayle {Bromley, Kirsty Lowell,Chris {Breese(Hugh Gaitskell) {Adrian Terry,Lila Batley,Michelle {Smith(Belle Isle) {M.Derrick( Hunslet)} { {Lynne Wilson(Bewerley Street Primary) Photographs {P.Haswell,K.M.Shilton Special thanks to Chris Breese for Coordinating and typing final draught.
